item.title: Excommunicate your ideas
item.description: Your side-projects deserve a decisive, merciful death at your hands. You dragged them into this world, you’ll fling them out. And do it quickly. I want to talk about killing our much beloved side-projects, and why this is totally a good idea. Then I want to talk about why this could be a terrible idea. I’m not here for resolutions. There are two parts of my personality, plucked from the universe-scale D&D Players Manual, which make the question “should I carry on with this side project?
